backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, registrations, OTP generation/verification, and access control using authorization and blob-storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing admin panel bugs, related frontend files, components, and test IDs for build traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files, describing responsibilities for registration flow, admin panel, hooks, styling, and config.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark OKLCH color variables, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component managing splash screen, view switching between registration and admin panels, and resetting registration flow state.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen with reduced-motion support, auto-dismiss timer, and manual skip behavior before loading the app.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Admin dashboard handling authentication, role checks, admin claiming, registration selection, detail viewing, and edit mode integration.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: UI card for entering and applying an admin setup code, showing loading, success, and error states.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/E: Form to edit registration fields with validation, save handling, and read-only registration info.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/R: Displays registration details with loading, error, and empty states, plus admin edit and refetch controls.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: React Query hooks for admin checks, fetching registrations, fetching single registration with receipt, and updating registrations.
Mutation hook to apply an admin setup code, initialize backend access, and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/features/registration/compo: Error boundary that catches step-level errors and displays a recovery UI with reload option.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Provides React Query mutations for OTP generation, OTP verification, and submitting registration with file-to-blob conversions.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Controls the multi‑step registration process, managing step state, validation, and transitions.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Renders and validates a customer details form, updating parent state only when validity or data changes.
Handles OTP entry, generation, verification, and triggers final registration submission, showing success UI on completion.
Displays terms, manages acceptance state, records acceptance timestamp, and provides a printable proof view.
Manages uploading and previewing Aadhaar, PAN, and optional UPI receipt files while validating document completeness.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Defines the list of terms and conditions sections and items for the registration flow.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Declares TypeScript interfaces for customer details, document data, and step props used in registration.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Validates customer details, checking required fields, phone format, age, email, and address completeness.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, initializing access control and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status state. Includes helper functions to create AuthClient and expose identity via a custom hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, color variables, dark mode settings, print styles, and splash screen background and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage values, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration file extending themes, colors, fonts, container settings, and custom keyframes/plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and feature metadata for a multi‑step customer registration system.
